rules_text:
Devoid [i](This card has no color.)[/i]
Up to two target creatures can't block this turn.
Coalesce {4}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this for {4}{R}{R} from your graveyard. If you do, put it onto the battlefield as an Eldrazi Horror creature. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
